"I am pleased to announce the publication of my article titled "ğ—ªğ—µğ—®ğ˜ ğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—³ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—µğ—²ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—°ğ˜€ ğ˜ğ—²ğ—®ğ—°ğ—µğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—¶ğ—» ğ—§ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—¶ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—® ğ—¶ğ—» ğ—® ğ—¸ğ—»ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—±ğ—´ğ—² ğ—²ğ—°ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—¼ğ—ºğ˜† ğ—±ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—» ğ—¯ğ˜† ğ—®ğ—¿ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—³ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—²ğ—»ğ—°ğ—²? " ğ—¶ğ—» ğ—¥ğ—²Ìğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—²Ìğ˜€ ğ—ºğ—®ğ—´ğ—®ğ˜‡ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—². This article allows me to share my insights on mathematics education in Tunisia, a subject that holds special significance for me due to my professional experience and my involvement with the Tunisian AI Society and RECONNECTT. I hope that this contribution will spark meaningful discussions. In the article, I explore the current state of mathematics teaching in Tunisia, highlighting its critical role in the development and application of artificial intelligence. Despite the significant contributions of certain Tunisian experts, several university professors specializing in AI have observed a troubling decline in this field in Tunisia. The aim of the article is to raise awareness, propose solutions, and foster debate on this vital issue. I hope that my reflections will add to the ongoing conversations about the future of education in Tunisia. I invite readers to explore the article and share their thoughts, questions, and reactions. Your feedback is invaluable, as it is through dialogue that we can advance our ideas." #LoyalDiaspora #TunisianAISociety #RECONNECTT #TunisiaCyberShield
